precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over the desktop background.
action: Right Click the desktop to open the context menu.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options to manage desktop items and properties.

precondition: The right-click context menu is open on the desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the "Display Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Appearance" tab is currently selected.
The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab selected.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will display "Windows XP", and the "Wait" time will be set to "10 minutes".

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the down arrow button next to the 'Wait' time spin box.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of screen saver wait times will appear.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Screen saver" dropdown menu and select "(None)".
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will display "(None)" as the selected option. The "Settings" button will become inactive.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Apply" button is active.
expected_results: The selected screen saver settings will be applied.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power..." button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is open, displaying a list of time intervals.
action: Click on "After 5 hours" in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" setting will change to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The changes to the power settings will be applied.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab selected. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu should display "(None)".
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the window.
